turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly what would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many people will a large feed

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 average appetites or 3 hearty appetites

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I'd like a large please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which type of sauce do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Marinara

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni, sausage and bacon

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a Superbowl special with 5 toppings for $19.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is the 3 topping one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's also $19.99, so you'd basically get 2 free toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I'd also like hamburger.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and one more topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of peppers do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Jalapeno or bell

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd also like jalapeno please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's one large pizza with pepperoni, bacon, sausage, hamburger and jalapenos?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is $19.99. Is that takeout or delivery?
